name: tubesync
tagline: A tool for syncing YouTube channels to media servers
description: Tubesync is a self-hosted tool that syncs YouTube channels and playlists to media servers like Jellyfin, downloading and organizing videos automatically with minimal configuration.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Automatically sync YouTube channels to your media server library

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Organize downloads for seamless integration with Jellyfin, Plex, or Emby

features.title: Automatic Downloads
features.description: Download new videos automatically as channels publish them

features.title: Metadata Management
features.description: Fetch and organize video metadata for proper media server cataloging

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Set rules to download only specific videos based on title, duration, or upload date
